generateGamma.description: Create a new Gamma generation job.

props.name: inputText
props.description: Text used to generate your gamma (1-750,000 characters).

props.name: textMode
props.description: How you want your inputText to be modified.

props.name: format
props.description: The type of artifact you want to create.

props.name: themeName
props.description: The theme from Gamma to be used. Defaults to workspace default.

props.name: numCards
props.description: How many cards to create (default 10). Pro: 1-50, Ultra: 1-75.

props.name: cardSplit
props.description: How your content will be divided into cards. Use '---' in text for breaks.

props.name: additionalInstructions
props.description: Extra specifications about the desired content and layouts (1-500 characters).

props.name: exportAs
props.description: Additional file types for saving your gamma.

props.name: textOptions
props.description: JSON object for text attributes (e.g., amount, tone, audience, language).

props.name: imageOptions
props.description: JSON object for image attributes (e.g., source, model, style).

props.name: cardOptions
props.description: JSON object for card attributes (e.g., dimensions).

props.name: sharingOptions
props.description: JSON object for sharing attributes (e.g., workspaceAccess, externalAccess).

getGeneration.description: Given a Generation ID, fetch the status, outputs, metadata, etc.

props.name: generationId
props.description: The ID of the generation job (from the "Generate Gamma" action).
